name: Radon Break
description:
Radon Blast is a classic Brick Breaker style game. Break bricks by using the ball. Get items like speed, ball splitter and paddle resize to make the game more challenging. Some specials like gun, power ball or block wall helps you while playing your game.

Radon Blast is full packed with randomly sorted stages. Jump from stage to stage, collect bonus items for a better higher score.

Features
  • 40 action stages
  • Retro game play with a modern twist
  • Clean 3D graphics and nice effects
  • Stunning chip tune enhanced music track
  • Specials Items: paddle resize, power ball, speed, glue, gun, ball splitter
  • Bonus Items: block wall, extra score, next level, extra ball

Gameplay Description
When you start the game, you see a playfield full of colored bricks, a ball and a paddle which you can move up/down with the gamepad.
Within the playfield, there is the current stage and your ball count. Below you can see the current score.

The player must break the bricks by using the ball. By moving the paddle up and down, the player must try to keep the ball in the current playfield.
The goal is to remove all bricks from the playfield to go to the next stage.

Depending on the collision angle between the ball and the paddle, the ball direction can be changed. While playing, the speed increases and the game will become more challenging. Hidden Items like speed, ball splitter and paddle resize to make the game more challenging. Some specials like gun, power ball or block wall helps you while playing.
